roleset.name: (cause to) become moist, especially the skin

role.descr: agent of moisturizing, entity putting lotion on
instrument, lotion or other liquid put on arg 1

example.name: adjectival
example.text: The bottle of essence itself is merely a kind of moisturizing lotion, but it comes with a complimentary bottle of L-Ascorbic acid dry powder.

example.name: All Arguments
example.text: Mary moisturizes her feet every day with Jergens.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'moisturize' based on sentences in Webtext 2.5-2. Verbnet entry 41.1.1.
